strings.string: ITA_Installation enables you to configure settings - Antenna, Channel, Transponder, CAS, etc
ITA_The Archive allows you to playback or delete recordings
ITA_The EPG displays the programme information of each channel, in time and date order
ITA_The Channel List provides you with functions such as sorting and editing TV/Radio channel list
ITA_The Media Center lets you browse and view videos, photos, and music from your storage
ITA_STB Info provides the STB status including product name and number, free disk space, etc
ITA_Learn how to get the most out of PRISMCUBE RUBY
ITA_Get current weather and weather forecast for thousands of cities around the world
ITA_View your pictures as a slideshow with nice transition effects
ITA_Organize your video content by information associated with the video files
ITA_Organize your music collection by information stored in your music file ID tag, like title, artist, album, genre and popularity
ITA_Add-ons are packages that add features and functions not normally included with the XBMC Media Center
ITA_Most of the Media Center's settings can be configured via the GUI under Settings
ITA_The File Manager lets you transfer, copy, delete and rename files and folders on your disk drive, FTP-shares, etc
ITA_System Info allows you to see your system status
ITA_Check your PRISMCUBE RUBY info at a glance
ITA_To see all the other menus, press i button
ITA_Fav. Addons provides a convenient way to access to your XBMC addons
Modo ciclo di ricerca dei programmi
Durata di visualizzazione della segnalazione di programma
Durata di visualizzazione della segnalazione di riproduzione
